name: Little Willie's Adventure
description:
Help Little Willie.
He is being held in an under water cage by fisherman, and has lost his family.
Its your job to help him out, and go on an adventure to find his family.
Avoid the fishing hooks, submarines, rocks and the dangerous coral.
Work your way through sea weed and in the bonus star fish frenzy.
Collect star fish for points, and see if you can find Little Willie's family.

Tap style game, Tap or hold the left of screen to move forward, tap the right side of screen to swim up.
Challenge friends and the world on the leader board, see if you can reach number one.
